channel.title: GF my 150m+ bank
channel.description:
okay, so last night I was asked to join my friends friends swiftirc to PK with them, his friend had been risking like 16m, other was risking 22m, and my friend Abdul was there with me [one who takes the pic shown], so I join the irc, and all of a sudden I dc, yet I can do everything else, so I try to get back on 5 minutes later, password changed, I was risking max mage, dfs, claws, and bandos.
No ROL.
Kid got everything. [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/519/gds3e.png[/img] *I'm the guy in ahrims and sara cape.*
GF my bank.
Tried recovering 12 times, all denied, starting rs over again will be fucking fun Y0
give me ideas on quick ways to bot that give me good xp per hour. making a maxed barrow pure.

[quote=“Natey, post:20, topic:353951”]Yeah, I’m going to stick with rsps, atm trying to find out how to add models to project insanity so I can add a chaotic rapier and st00f.[/quote]no models plspls

I’ve also got a future barrow pure, but its kinda fail atm.
61 attack, 67 strength, 52 defence, 51 range, 95 magic, 36 prayer, 63 hp. I have epic magic, other than that I kinda suck.[/quote]I’m going to suicide bot

item.title: GF my 150m+ bank
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Since jmood decided to answer for me, ill just make a comparison >.<

Think about turning a light off, you don’t call it removing, but you could get away with calling it deactivating

Deactivate - To make inactive.
Remove - To get rid of.

Read full topic

item.title: GF my 150m+ bank
item.dc:creator: @pauline pauline
item.description:
@pauline wrote:

jmood128:

deactivating and removing are not the same thing, deactivating we are leaving the code there but commenting it out. Removing is removing the code.

Commenting out is basically removing. When we compile, things that are quoted out are skipped (aka, removed).

Read full topic

item.title: GF my 150m+ bank
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“pauline, post:26, topic:353951”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=450246.msg3303116#msg3303116 date=1281458306]

Also, your entire runescape connection is not encrypted, but your username and password are encrypted with RSA, making it impossible for them to be ‘sniffed’ or stolen even if they were in your router or right next to you with a laptop grabbing your wireless packets.

did we remove the RSA stuff in the deobs?

No, I believe we just deactivate it. (Correct me if I’m wrong someone)
[/quote]
Lol? That’s the same thing.[/quote]

deactivating and removing are not the same thing, deactivating we are leaving the code there but commenting it out. Removing is removing the code.

Read full topic

item.title: GF my 150m+ bank
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:353951”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=450246.msg3302938#msg3302938 date=1281444688]
However the IRC doesn’t show your IP…
[/quote]

It doesn’t, unless they run their own server, but his IP still wouldn’t get them anything. You can’t do anything with just an IP.

unless he made the irc channel
with a own irc channel you can do mutch of things spreading your bots (rats) on it etc

No, you can’t spread anything on IRC, even if you run your own server (which I do). You can send files over IRC to people, but the person would have to physically accept them and then run them, same as over the web.

[quote author=Natey link=topic=450246.msg3303005#msg3303005 date=1281451813]

so I join the irc, and all of a sudden I dc, yet I can do everything else, so I try to get back on 5 minutes later, password changed

I’m sorry, but this isn’t possible. You cannot ‘be hacked’ through IRC, ever. For him to have gotten any type of information, you either had to type it into IRC (you didn’t use the same password as you do in RS did you?..), some website, or you downloaded and ran a program he sent you that was a virus. Before starting any new account you obviously should figure out how he got your password in the first place shouldn’t you? Otherwise you are just wasting your time leveling up another account for him.
[/quote]wasting time?
I’ve tried 20+ recoveries so far, DENIED.
And it is possible to gain information on an unencrypted connection, with cain and abel.
so i’ve heard…

I’m saying you will be wasting time leveling up another character, because if you installed one of his viruses on your computer he still has access to your password.

It is possible to steal your information over an un-encrypted connection, IF they are in between you and the internet (eg, your router) or if you are connected via wifi and they are within a few hundred feet of you. Obviously neither one of those things happened.

Also, your entire runescape connection is not encrypted, but your username and password are encrypted with RSA, making it impossible for them to be ‘sniffed’ or stolen even if they were in your router or right next to you with a laptop grabbing your wireless packets.

Bottom line is connecting to IRC did not get your password stolen, even if he owns the server, and has your IP. You either told him your password some way (used it as your IRC password perhaps?), or you downloaded and ran a program from him that contained a virus, probably with a keylogger in it. Understand? :)[/quote]Most likely.
I found out what it was, my Nod32 was off and I had ran his private server which had a crypted RAT file, which was started when I started the client.
It’s gone now, so I don’t need to worry.
He now has all my info.
great on my part for thinking, hurrrrr.

Read full topic

[quote author=Natey link=topic=450246.msg3303005#msg3303005 date=1281451813]

I’m sorry, but this isn’t possible. You cannot ‘be hacked’ through IRC, ever. Before starting any new account you obviously should figure out how he got your password in the first place shouldn’t you? Otherwise you are just wasting your time leveling up another account for him.
[/quote]wasting time?
I’ve tried 20+ recoveries so far, DENIED.
And it is possible to gain information on an unencrypted connection, with cain and abel.
so i’ve heard…

I’m saying you will be wasting time leveling up another character, because if you installed one of his viruses on your computer he still has access to your password.

It is possible to steal your information over an un-encrypted connection, IF they are in between you and the internet (eg, your router) or if you are connected via wifi and they are within a few hundred feet of you. Obviously neither one of those things happened.

Also, your entire runescape connection is not encrypted, but your username and password are encrypted with RSA, making it impossible for them to be ‘sniffed’ or stolen even if they were in your router or right next to you with a laptop grabbing your wireless packets.

Bottom line is connecting to IRC did not get your password stolen, even if he owns the server, and has your IP. You either told him your password some way (used it as your IRC password perhaps?), or you downloaded and ran a program from him that contained a virus, probably with a keylogger in it. Understand? :)[/quote]

ned moar explnaton pl0x

pure2ownage:

However the IRC doesn’t show your IP…

It doesn’t, unless they run their own server, but his IP still wouldn’t get them anything. You can’t do anything with just an IP.

[quote=“3hituu, post:16, topic:353951”]unless he made the irc channel
with a own irc channel you can do mutch of things spreading your bots (rats) on it etc[/quote]

No, you can’t spread anything on IRC, even if you run your own server (which I do). You can send files over IRC to people, but the person would have to physically accept them and then run them, same as over the web.

[quote=“Natey, post:18, topic:353951”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=450246.msg3302898#msg3302898 date=1281439934]

so I join the irc, and all of a sudden I dc, yet I can do everything else, so I try to get back on 5 minutes later, password changed

I’m sorry, but this isn’t possible. You cannot ‘be hacked’ through IRC, ever. For him to have gotten any type of information, you either had to type it into IRC (you didn’t use the same password as you do in RS did you?..), some website, or you downloaded and ran a program he sent you that was a virus. Before starting any new account you obviously should figure out how he got your password in the first place shouldn’t you? Otherwise you are just wasting your time leveling up another account for him.
[/quote]wasting time?
I’ve tried 20+ recoveries so far, DENIED.
And it is possible to gain information on an unencrypted connection, with cain and abel.
so i’ve heard…[/quote]

I’m saying you will be wasting time leveling up another character, because if you installed one of his viruses on your computer he still has access to your password.

It is possible to steal your information over an un-encrypted connection, IF they are in between you and the internet (eg, your router) or if you are connected via wifi and they are within a few hundred feet of you. Obviously neither one of those things happened.

Also, your entire runescape connection is not encrypted, but your username and password are encrypted with RSA, making it impossible for them to be ‘sniffed’ or stolen even if they were in your router or right next to you with a laptop grabbing your wireless packets.

Bottom line is connecting to IRC did not get your password stolen, even if he owns the server, and has your IP. You either told him your password some way (used it as your IRC password perhaps?), or you downloaded and ran a program from him that contained a virus, probably with a keylogger in it. Understand?
